channel.title: NyxOnline - Public Beta - 317 PI - Webclient - Unique Content - Custom XP lock
channel.description:
[center]--Some Cool Pic Goes Here--[/center]
[b]Website:[/b] [url=http://www.nyx-online.info]Nyx-Online[/url] [b]Forums:[/b] [url=http://www.nyx-online.info/smf]Nyx Forums[/url] [b]Webclient:[/b] [url=http://www.nyx-online.info/play.php]Play Now![/url] [b]Client Download:[/b] [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/Client.jar]Download Now[/url]
[b]Media:[/b] Runecrafting Altar Selection: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cCRG5HG.png[/img] Trade screen: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zr9ZvDk.png[/img] Home boss (the blue thing is a charm from previous kill): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bqIauim.png[/img] Yell/Chat. All ranked players are forced to have that rank shown (they cannot change it under and circumstances): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5N3S43M.png[/img] Kept On Death Screen (Value ranked in cfg.) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SaBRIm8.png[/img] Equipment Screen: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BIImesD.png[/img] Farming: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7qtLX4tkgwY[/youtube] Got a brand new 100% custom (all done by me) XP lock system [Thanks to moparians for helping with by bugs] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KSVTxU6v86c[/youtube]
Coming soon: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kaW6xei.png[/img] [Need a new name for this quest]
[hr] [b]Other Content:[/b] Near perfect mithril seeds. Amazing herblore. Working overloads. Much much more. What Are you waiting for? Click the links on top to begin today [hr]
[b]The Team:[/b] Jal - Jal is the head website developer, and has handled everything I needed him to on the website. That's.. About all :) (he's an owner in game, bla bla bla).
Mod Sk8r (Sk8rdude461) - I'm the head Server and Client developer, handling everything for the game. I take all user input (if any) and see how it looks, before implementing it in the game (unless the idea just isn't fit. etc). I attempt to fix all bugs, and all issues if we have them. I literally run the whole server.
JavaLearner - My Co-Developer and coder. He's helped a lot with things I got stuck on, and our server is better than ever because of his help.

I take all user input (if any) and see how it looks, before implementing it in the game (unless the idea just isn’t fit. etc). I attempt to fix all bugs, and all issues if we have them. I literally run the whole server.

JavaLearner - My Co-Developer and coder. He’s helped a lot with things I got stuck on, and our server is better than ever because of his help.
